mapper.insert: insert into dwt_visit_record (id, appointment_date, finish_date, mrm_member_id, dwt_clinical_history_id, phase, visit_content, sys_clinic_id, creator_id, creation_date, finished) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appointmentDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{finishDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mrmMemberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dwtClinicalHistoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phase,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{visitContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysClinicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{finished,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update dwt_visit_record set appointment_date = #{appointmentDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, finish_date = #{finishDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mrm_member_id = #{mrmMemberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dwt_clinical_history_id = #{dwtClinicalHistoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phase = #{phase,jdbcType=INTEGER}, visit_content = #{visitContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_clinic_id = #{sysClinicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creation_date = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, finished = #{finished,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, appointment_date, finish_date, mrm_member_id, dwt_clinical_history_id, phase, visit_content, sys_clinic_id, creator_id, creation_date, finished from dwt_visit_record where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, appointment_date, finish_date, mrm_member_id, dwt_clinical_history_id, phase, visit_content, sys_clinic_id, creator_id, creation_date, finished from dwt_visit_record

select * from view_dwt_visit_record
(appointmentDate between #{appointmentDate[0]} and #{appointmentDate[1]}) and
(sysClinicId = #{sysClinicId}) and
(creatorId = #{creatorId}) and
(finished = #{finished}) and
(mrmMemberName like '${mrmMemberName}%' or mrmMemberCode like '${mrmMemberName}%' or phone like '${mrmMemberName}%') and
order by appointmentDate
select * from dwt_visit_record where dwt_clinical_history_id = #{dwtClinicalHistoryId} and finished is false
